website_summaries.verdict: A convenient, rechargeable computer vacuum with a unique shape.
pros: Offers a quick way to switch from vacuum to blower simply by switching ends
Charges in just a few hours via USB, and motor runs steadily and reliably
cons: Best for light vacuuming needs, not heavy dust or debris

customer_reviews.title: it packs a lot of power in this little thing
customer_reviews.text: vacuum came with 3 heads that works on both side of the machine. the suction power is really good, 5 minutes in my car and you wouldn't believe how much dirt it caught. I never would've thought my car was so dirty. the blower is a really smart design, making use of whats already on there. I'm using it for both the car and my work space. I'd say it was a smart buy
customer_reviews.author: JasonQ

customer_reviews.title: Works well for keyboards and consoles
customer_reviews.text: This mini vac/air blower actually works surprisingly well at getting dirt and grim out of your keyboard also as a bonus it comes in real handy at getting dust out of your ps4's fans due to the thin nozzle.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Knight

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it’s supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically to blow out my robo vacs filter off once a week and it definitely gets the job done. Vacuumed a few places such as around the keyboard at my desk and stuff like that, works well. Does exactly what it’s supposed to do and I would recommend this product, I’ve looked around for other products similar to this one and either couldn’t find any or they were too expensive for what it will be used for.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: This is a handy unit for cleaning computer equipment.
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this vacuum I charged it up over-night. When I clicked the power button, it did not turn on. I wrote to the seller and got an easy fix, hold the on/off button for about three seconds. It worked like a charm!!! Thank you to the seller for being responsive and understanding. The vacuum has plenty of suction and blowing power to clean my computer equipment. The attachments make it very easy to give your computer equipment a thorough cleaning. Charging the unit is easy and convenient. I recommend this product for anyone looking to clean their computer.
customer_reviews.author: DVC member

customer_reviews.title: No problems after a replacement
customer_reviews.text: I initially gave a negative review because the first unit had a defective battery and wouldn't hold a charge. I was contacted by the company and the sent me a replacement. After a few months of regular use I've had zero issues. Overall, this thing is great for getting the dust off all my electronics. I use it on my keyboards, instruments, laptops, etc. You'll be disappointed if you're expecting strong suction power, but again, it's more meant for simple / light cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Peters Jr.

customer_reviews.title: What a neat little gadget
customer_reviews.text: This is great for little jobs in the rv. Don't expect it to be a full handheld, because it isn't. The input is pretty small, so it can't suck up things like leaves. The brush attachment does great getting dust out of little nooks and crannies, and it picks up stray cat litter wonderfully. Do empty it outside, as it is one of those bagless canisters, and the dust can spread. I still carry a wall outlet powered small vacuum for weekly cleaning, but this is great for in between times, and is so small I usually just leave it in the console. One of the best things I've purchased for the rv.
customer_reviews.author: CharlotteTheCat

customer_reviews.title: Meet All My Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum for my van, because my kids always eat snack in the van. My wife has to pick up crackers or bread crumbs from the car seat every day. It takes a lot of time. This vacuum is very light and small-- easy to carry. It is cordless, and the filter is easy to clean. The suction power is great, though. Small, convenient and powerful vacuum, meet all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Worthless, IMO
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe there are reviewers saying this has powerful air flow. It does not. I might as well whisper sweat nothings into my computer as try to use this device to blow dust out of my keyboard or to vacuum any up. In fairness, it WILL suck up some dust, but you have to be right on it and actually scrub with the brush to loosen it. I returned mine and will probably get either a dedicated blower or a plugin vaccum.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Price

customer_reviews.title: Power Button Can Have Issues
customer_reviews.text: So yah I brought this thing to the office in order to clean a keyboard. Turned it on and cleaned my keyboard well. Then surprisingly I could never turn it off. Tried the 1 second turn off and didn't work. Realized it would run for 50 mins. Tossed it in my car and muffled the sound in order to avoid people thinking it was a bomb. Numerous coworkers gawking at my idiocy. Add a working on and off switch next time.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Handy unit for cleaning up keyboards, etc.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this vacuum unit very long, but already it's proven itself very convenient at helping keep my keyboard and other computer components free from dust and dog hairs. It's easy to hold, and while I usually use the narrow nozzle for the keyboard, the brush nozzle is good for getting into the tighter spaces between key groups as well as for cleaning the top of my computer case without scratching the finish.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Will not take a charge. If you're looking for a black plastic cylinder, highly recommended. If you want a vacuum cleaner, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Historicus

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clean my keyboard. Works for me. It does not have the suction of a vacuum cleaner, but that is good. I am antsy about damaging stuff. I am using it for other things also. I have some handmade beaded felt ornaments that pick up everything out of the air. This little unit is gentle enough to clean them.
customer_reviews.author: Kimist

customer_reviews.title: Surprise! It works!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little light-duty duster. It has enough suction to actually pick up dust, but, not enough to destroy plants or other delicate objects. Cleaning the filter is a chore, though, one will want a stiff brush to remove all of the dust in order to restore full suction power.
customer_reviews.author: W. Dolak

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use portable vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small vacuum I could use to clean already-assembled Legos and this satisfies that need. The brush attachment loosens dust which is quickly suctioned away. The reverse (blowing air) also works well. This has been used successfully also for cleaning electronics, keyboards, and other small items where either I didn't want to have to grab the regular house vacuum or the house vacuum hose was too large and cumbersome,
customer_reviews.author: R. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Don't use this for cleaning CDs/DVDs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vacuum/blower so that I could clean the dust off of blank CDs and DVDs without having to buy multiple compressed air cans. Neither the suck nor the blow are powerful enough to get rid of hard dust on my CDs. Blow is like a hair dryer on low speed so it seems you can only blow light dust. The suck works to pick up small light objects like small bread crumbs and pet hair. Didn't work for my purposes. Returning. Rating 4 stars because it does pick up stuff and the blow could be used for light dust, just not as strong as I wanted. The description seemed accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Krechenkaari Klein

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Not much power, awkward to use. At a $40 price point, I think I expected more. The problem could be my expectations. I really wish I had bought a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Wilson

customer_reviews.title: great gadget.
customer_reviews.text: Five stars and plus! watching a video about housecleaning at Buckingham Palace, I noticed them dusting the valuable ornaments with a complexion brush in one hand and a small vacuum nozzle held a few inches away in the other. This little vacuum works perfectly and of course on a computer as well. Clean the filter with the big vacuum when you are doing the floors.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: No suction
customer_reviews.text: I tried using this tonight and there was absolutely no suction power at all. All it did was move the dust around with its brush. Totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: J. Maz

customer_reviews.title: Basically just a mini vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Bought to dust my PC but the blowing part of the vacuum is not strong enough. However, I do like the suction part for cleaning crumbs and small messes so I will still use it for my car and around the room. Easy to clean and I like that you can charge it as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb

customer_reviews.title: Works well.  Lasts for longer than I would think.
customer_reviews.text: I would love it, 5 stars, if it had come with an extra filter. I use this to clean inside and outside of computers that have been in service for over a year and they have lots of dust bunnies and such. I only use the brush attachment for fine dust cleaning, stuff larger than a small eraiser head gets stuck in it. I take the filter off and use it as a blower and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: ABCC

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Just got the vacuum cleaner yesterday, and used it to clean my keyboard and the seats in my car. Very amazed at its suction power--which sucks the dust on the surface right away. Also very easy to use and easy to charge. The different sizes of nozzles are very useful!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Chen

customer_reviews.title: Great to use
customer_reviews.text: Well this vacuum was clean easy to my pc.I use this to clean my car fan too.The vacuum it look like so small but it was so powerful and very easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Kai chan

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for vacuuming dust out of the inside of my computer and off fan screens and keyboards. It works very well for this purpose, as it is light and easily maneuverable. It would be inappropriate for heavy-duty cleaning tasks. I'm informed the new model has double the suction.
customer_reviews.author: Ich GmbH

customer_reviews.title: Cool.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for vacuuming hard to reach areas and it's super nice because of how portable it is. When I have a small mess and I don't want to get out the full vacuum, I can just whip this bad boy out and it'll get the job done (within reason).
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great for fabric lovers.
customer_reviews.text: I got this little vacuum to pick up all the fabric fuzz my server puts out. This one worked right out of the box and does it’s job picking up fuzz and thread which are both lightweight. Easy to use and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieD

customer_reviews.title: useless item - negligeable suction and blow, and quite noisy on top
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, this is more of a toy rather than a serious blower/suction tool. Tried on several things, with no visible result. It is very weak , while bulky to hold, and noisy. it wouldn't even help for electronics/ boards cleaning where not much power is needed, since there are no attachable tubing/ accessories that would make it reach difficult to reach spots inside machines. Acknowledge though that customer follow-up is decent, and refund was flawless (hence 2 stars not 1)
customer_reviews.author: cfayek

customer_reviews.title: Very useful n easy to storage
customer_reviews.text: Never thought it could be this powerful ... I used it almost for everywhere in my room even for my bed lol..... it can last very long once you charge it n easy to storage since it's small..
customer_reviews.author: Candice H Lau

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little gadget
customer_reviews.text: This unit works extremely well. I was replacing fans in my laptop and figured why not use this instead of canned air. Works extremely well and cleared all the dust.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M.

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Air
customer_reviews.text: This is a much better value than compressed air. Not only does not run out, it also doesn't freeze your hand or spray dust (and who knows what else) all over your desk.
customer_reviews.author: Danie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Fast Shipping! Great Seller
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my husband and he loved it. He uses it to clean off his computers and it works just like i had hoped. Will be buying more from this seller. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Rocks

customer_reviews.title: Works ok.
customer_reviews.text: It’s good, but I thought the suction power was gonna be stronger... it sometimes has trouble picking up the littlest of things. But works good overall.
customer_reviews.author: Elvis

customer_reviews.title: sucks okay, does not blow
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use as a blower to clean out a PC but the blowing function is was too weak to clean out any dust or particles. Its an okay vacuum but terrible blower.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Thomas

customer_reviews.title: great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mini vacuum it's to clean my piano . it is easy to charge. Very useful because it’s powerful and light weight!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Works well for cleaning keyboards
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use at my office. It works well for cleaning my keyboard. It has where you can use suction or use blower to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Taxlady

customer_reviews.title: GOOD VALUE
customer_reviews.text: Like that it is simple and easy to use. Works great on computer keyboards which is the reason I bought it and it and it is easy to store away in a drawer. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cleaning the Gecko cage!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a small battery operated vacuum specifically for cleaning out our gecko cage. I couldn't be more pleased with this! Works perfect and easily gets into tight spaces. Suction is good and the cage has never been cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Justin W Auch

customer_reviews.title: you don't specify what WALL CHARGER to to use for recharge, which I can purchase from Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: What WALL CHARGER should i buy from Amazon necessary to recharge the COMPUTER VACUUMS CLEANER AIR DUSTER, Model HK-6027 which I bought from Amazon? The vacuum and attachments are great, however once the battery runs out of power, it needs to be recharged .... you don't specify what WALL CHARGER to to use, which I can purchase from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Irvatnj

customer_reviews.title: A dud
customer_reviews.text: I got this tool to clean my computer keyboard but when I got it it didn't work. I had to send it back and find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisser Stand

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This vac works better than expected. I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: SchwartzKat

customer_reviews.title: The effect is very good
customer_reviews.text: The product has been received and used. The effect is very good. The price performance ratio is very high. It is cheap, easy to use and very satisfactory
customer_reviews.author: Ralap Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying again
customer_reviews.text: The blowing and suction power are not so strong. The brush attachment helped because I could get closer to the surface but even then, it didn't pick up the dust. I would recommend against buying this product. Very disappointing. The only decent feature is the cylindrical shape. It was easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Convenient tools to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Compact and fashionable design. It come with three different cleaning parts and fit various cleaning purposes. I’m glad to use it in my home and office.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Does not charge or turn on!
customer_reviews.text: Very dissapointed. After 2 weeks, it just stopped working. Does not charge or turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Dorj

customer_reviews.title: 5/5 Good for light use
customer_reviews.text: Expected the suction to be a little stronger, but it's adequate for cleaning my laptop/keyboard. Haven't needed to use the blower function yet. 5/5 Additional thoughts: May want to update product in future to be usb-c.
customer_reviews.author: K. L.

customer_reviews.title: Literally sucks, but not well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to clean my external keyboard because I have cats, and their hair plus dust always gets trapped under the keycaps. Both the suction and the blow sides aren't strong enough to get anything clean - especially when I stick on the attachment heads.
customer_reviews.author: clbw

customer_reviews.title: Good desk vac
customer_reviews.text: Not much power, but adequate to handle eraser dust on my sketchboard and desk, keyboard, etc. Charges easily (USB), sleek looking, and has several interchangeable nozzles. The long nozzle works best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Michael

customer_reviews.title: Is as advertised 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my boyfriend. He has used it a couple times to clean his keyboard off (he smokes while he plays video games) and it's efficient. I personally also like it is cordless.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Doughman

customer_reviews.title: very powerful
customer_reviews.text: This compact vacuum is powerful and it’s also a blower, great for small area like keyboard, it’s also rechargeable.it's very convince to bring everywhere.love it
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with the purchased vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I finally purchased this product. Compact and lightweight vacuum cleaner. Easily cleaned his laptop, cleaned his wife's computer. The whole family is happy with the purchase. Wipe the keys with napkins, this is not what you need , but a mini vacuum cleaner , this product is ideal for appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: it does what advertise, just not very good at it.
customer_reviews.text: bought it for mainly cleaning out pc and after of month of use its underwhelming. sucking power is ok could be a little better, and blowing strength is absurd. this could be much stronger.. would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sergio castro

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This i a handy vac that does a good job of vacuuming, is handy, and has a cleaver blow amplifier attachment. Just be SURE TO HOLD THE ON SWITCH FOR 4 TO 10 SECONDS to turn on. Not mentioned in the instruction manual.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Strong sucking and blowing power. Very easy to clean and charge. Built in good quality. Would recommend my friends to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: yh l

customer_reviews.title: Great experience
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on-time and securely packed. I have a habit of multitasking on the laptop so the vacuum was in for a nice introduction. It performed beautifully. The seller personally reached out to ensure complete satisfaction, which was a nice touch. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: ANJALI

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tool
customer_reviews.text: Love this product so much.Super compact and effective! The different attachments are great for doing various jobs.It’s also great for quickly cleaning trim work.
customer_reviews.author: Stetson Couch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great deal, works well, I use it regularly in my suv. I like to snack snd it cleans like it should. And holds charge better then my cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy S

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my laptop clean
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is so easy to use. Attachments lets you clean a lot a places. So glad I bought this. You should, too!
customer_reviews.author: JKB

customer_reviews.title: It works now
customer_reviews.text: I heard from the manufacturer who told me to hold down the start button for 4-5 seconds. It works so I am giving them a rating of 5. I needed this vacuum to clean my sewing machine and it works great for that. Thank you for your prompt response.
customer_reviews.author: Quilter 42

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Vaccum
customer_reviews.text: This Product is great and it has right amount of power to blow away the dust and works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Arunkishore Srinivasan

customer_reviews.title: do the job
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Works I like the fact that is portable Cons: Loud only came with one filter.
customer_reviews.author: MaxDovahkiin

customer_reviews.title: light weight,easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great mini vacuum, it looks durable, mini size and light weight, easy to clean my desk, keyboard, I like it and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and does the job
customer_reviews.text: I used it for cleaning the keyboard of my laptop and is really good for that. I used it for cleaning hair as well but the blower is not that good, just keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Eury Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelming blower. Ok vacuum
customer_reviews.text: The suction and blower are just ok. If you were looking for a replacement for compressed air, this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: casino11

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for cleaning computer keyboards. Would definitely recommend. Seller is very responsive to any questions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased, as I do a lot of sewing. Dust, threads etc gets caught in small difficult places.
customer_reviews.author: Portia Kimbrel

customer_reviews.title: Great product. recommend to buy
customer_reviews.text: It can absorb a lot of small dust that I can't clean up, which will save me a lot of trouble. Moreover. it is easy to carry and I can do a lot of things with it. Moreover. it can clean up very well without worrying about the cleanliness
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Waltman

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: This is a small vacuum cleaner with good cost performance. The suction is very satisfactory, the operation is simple, easy to use, and it is a perfect product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather H Mathis

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: it's amazing to turn it on and look around and see all the places where it is useful. Works good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: more suction power is needed
customer_reviews.text: The blowing power is much better than the suction power.
customer_reviews.author: Peijan Hsia

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice and Small Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little tool! It's very light weight with excellent suction or blower power. It's easy to use, easy to clean and it maintains excellent battery charge life. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: CRT

customer_reviews.title: Lacks suction
customer_reviews.text: Product ok for top cleaning but lacks suction to get between strings . Needs power boost. would not reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: C Fox

customer_reviews.title: Pretty weak
customer_reviews.text: Pretty weak. Not bad enough to return but not good enough to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: "E"

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: The function of this handheld vacuum cleaner is more powerful than I expected.There is no problem with the product. I think it’s worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Yishan

customer_reviews.title: Ok vacuum, needs bigger motor.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, wish the motor was a little stronger. I still prefer it over canned air. I use it on my computers and 3D printer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: It is very convenient to collect dust in my car. Nice cleaner. I would like to recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: juncheng li

customer_reviews.title: It works good for a small vaccum..
customer_reviews.text: The works for what it was designed for. A bit noisy because of the high speed motor.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R Kicenski

customer_reviews.title: Works as listed
customer_reviews.text: Keeps a good charge. Once my staff saw it, many wanted to use it! Very glad made this purchase. Very handy!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Schwannecke

customer_reviews.title: Suction is very weak
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to other reviews, I found the suctioning to be extremely weak. It wouldn't even suck small dust bunnies off a wire sculpture I have. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Derby Darling

customer_reviews.title: This SUCKS and NOT in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed in this product and the reviews. I can’t believe people accept this product the way it is and give it anything above 1 star. Most reviews are accurate in all my past purchases but these reviews are a HUGE disappointment. The suction was so weak it would not pick up a crumb on the counter. And a can of air has 10 times the strength as this blower. This product blows and sucks in a BAD way. Yes it was fully charged. I’m returning it the same day I got it. ☹️☹️☹️
customer_reviews.author: Papi

customer_reviews.title: Dead after one charge
customer_reviews.text: My first review was very low due to the fact I never got to use the product (batteries wouldn't charge even though the charge light was lit and I left it overnight). Someone contacted me (seller or manufacturer?) and offered to send me a new one at no charge, and I didn't need to send the dead one back. Very fast response and the new model (updated design) is working fine. The shape is a little cumbersome given the new larger size, and the power button feels odd, it's hard to tell if I'm pressing it hard enough (and it takes 3 seconds to come on by design), but those are minor nits.
customer_reviews.author: Mark the Edward

customer_reviews.title: Easy use. Easy carry
customer_reviews.text: It has small size and light weight. Combined with three small parts, it is easy to construct to be use for designed purposes. Its power is strong enough to remove dust inside computer. In addition, it is also useful for clean inside car.
customer_reviews.author: Dezhou Wang

customer_reviews.title: Updated Vacuum and Blower Works Better Great Cust SVC!!
customer_reviews.text: July-2019: Stopped working after one use. I returned vacuum. Oct-2019 Update: Customer service contacted me and sent a new and improved vacuum blower, and happy to say it works well, the vacuum is much stronger but the blower still seems a bit weak. Overall I would recommend this item for it’s convenience and for light duty.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: weak all around
customer_reviews.text: The suction power of this "vacuum" has the equivalent power of a one year old trying his first sippy cup drink. The power button loves to challenge me when I try to turn it on - it takes three tries before wheezing in. Drying power? You've got to be kidding for even asking.... NO, I definitely would not buy this again. It barely moves dust/crumbs off my keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Best Vacuum Product for Smaller Gadgets and Small Areas
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner deserves more attention. I am extremely happy with how easy it is to clean devices like laptop keyboards, small areas on the couch where there could be crumbs etc. You are only limited by your imagination...
customer_reviews.author: Alternator

customer_reviews.title: Terrific! So great for small spaces, little jobs.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this little vacuum. It is just the ticket for little jobs, like vacuuming dust from small delicate objects, cleaning crevices in car seats, cleaning a small ant swarm on the kitchen counter, etc. I am very happy with this purchase. I love that it charges with a USB cable and is otherwise cordless. Its battery lasts a surprisingly long time.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy Summers-Bair

customer_reviews.title: Good Computer Blower and Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This product is compact and powerful. It does a good job of cleaning up my keyboards and electronics. I like the ability to both blow and absorb dust. I have even used the attachments to clean some of my blinds. Overall it is very versatile. Additionally, it is easy to clean the filter. It was a useful product and a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Shiv P.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Home Office Tool!
customer_reviews.text: Handy little desk vacuum/duster tool. It looks sleek and doesn't take up a whole lot of space. Although it's a little loud, it's well worth it. Great for your home office for picking up dust bunnies or blowing gunk out of your keyboard and other dust-collecting electronics. Super convenient that it charges via USB as well.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl D

customer_reviews.title: Great product that could be improved
customer_reviews.text: The unit is great, but I wish it had a little more power. I use it to suck, or vacuum, fabric lint out from inside my sewing machine. It is important to know that that the tool either sucks out, or vacuums, and blows air around in reverse. It has attachments, but they are all hard plastic and inflexible. I wish it had a 8”-12” flexible hose extension; that would be a great improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Faithfull Fan

customer_reviews.title: Blows and sucks
customer_reviews.text: I like the dual functionality. I purchased this item to dust my computers inside. The suction or blowing power is not very strong, but I guess this is to protect the computers. I used both functions to clean my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Sorgalim

customer_reviews.title: Attachments only work with blower not suction
customer_reviews.text: I expected greater suction and do not know why one would want a blower. None of the attachments work on the suction side. I would have returned it if I had realized that before throwing away the box.
customer_reviews.author: Randy P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: very impressed with the quality of this vacuum and the customer service of ehoyal. the first one i received had a slight issue but they sent me a replacement within a week. overall an awesome product and would recommend to anyone looking for a light, cordless, and powerful vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Great little vacuum. I have a lot of computers due to my job and this is really useful. I didn't know this would make my life so much easier. quality and finish is good too compare to the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning device
customer_reviews.text: I keep this little device in my car and use it all the time. Very useful because it’s powerful and small.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Aversa

customer_reviews.title: Low power
customer_reviews.text: It's not very powerful. It works but that does clean most of the surfaces. I was trying for my laptop and window sides. Very limited power to blow or absorb the dust.
customer_reviews.author: Pundarikakkho Purokayastha

customer_reviews.title: Save your money! Buy the cans of air or something else.
customer_reviews.text: Not at all impressed. Not sure what this thing is good for? Definitely not for cleaning your computer. Weak is the best description for this.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey and Justin Ellwanger

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery by seller. Suction power is weak but functional. Blowing power is strong. Decent product for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: poulie and moolie

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for Handy Kitchen Tool
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this specifically for use in kitchen as I do a lot of chocolate work. Needed a blower that could remove little pieces from displays as well as blow colored cocoa butter in molds. So far it's worked pretty well - for the price I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jody T

customer_reviews.title: The design is very good
customer_reviews.text: It is enough to suck in all the dust in the corner area. The design is very good, this little thing works very well, blowing away all the dirt hidden in the keyboard, I will recommend friends.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for car
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to used in the car. I was impressed with cleaness and all the result. Easy to store, and light in weight. I would absoloutley recommend this to anyone who is looking for one.
customer_reviews.author: Zak J

customer_reviews.title: Just get it
customer_reviews.text: Was blown away on how fast it charged and also how it cleans, great investment
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This kind of design is fashionable and very modern, and works well. I bought this vacuum cleaner to clean the desk and keyboard on my notebook computer. It is cheap and worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie White

product_meta.title: Computer Vacuums Cleaner Air Duster 2-in-1 Keyboard Cleaner Blower Cleaner Handheld Cordless USB Rechargeable Portable Mini Vacuum Easy to Clean Dust Silver Grey
feature_bullets: Vacuum Cleaner/Air Duster 2-in-1: It's not only a powerful cordless vacuum cleaner but also an air duster(blower). One side of the cleaner is to absorb dust and the other side to blow away dust, which gives you efficiently cleaning experience

Long Lasting Battey: The laptop vacuum adopts 2200mAh high capacity lithium-ion batteries which makes working time up to 50 minutes. The mini size and lightweight makes it convenient carrying to clean keyboard, computer, laptop, cars, office desk, pet hair, dog hair, cat hair, pet house, crumbs, scraps, etc
Ultra Long Life：The mini vacuum cleaner ensures at least 1000 cyclic charging times and 5 years lifetime for dust buster

Fast & Safe Charging System: The cordless vacuum can be fully charged in 3-4 hours (USB charging port design). To ensure safety of the equipment during charging, the vacuum cleaner is designed with multiple protections: short circuit protection, temperature protection, input voltage protection and input current protection

Removable & Washable Vacuum Filter: The hand vacuum filter can be taken out and is water washable. Using tip: If the vacuum filter is full of dirt or suction weakens, please clean the filter in time to make sure the dust buster can work normally
